value.name: The Beast Must Die star Billy Howle: ‘Broken men are endlessly fascinating’
value.description: The actor tells RadioTimes.com about playing vulnerable and troubled characters, working with Helen McCrory, and what he's planning next.

value.name: Friends: The Reunion review — could the show be any more of a schmaltzfest?
value.description: Friends: The ReunionSky1/NowThe Beast Must DieBritboxMare of EasttownSky AtlanticIt’s genuinely hard to explain the significance of Friends to anybody who wasn’t there the first time around, but I’ve

value.name: Black St. Louisans Turn To Therapy, Nature And Family To Heal From Police Violence
value.description: In 2013, police shot and killed his younger brother, Jared Harris, whom they suspected of dealing drugs. After a high-speed chase, his brother crashed the car he was driving and then shot at police.

value.name: Teacher turns detective in drama series The Beast Must Die on BritBox
value.description: On an Easter visit to the pretty and historic island, teacher Frances (Cush Jumbo) lost her small son in an unwitnessed hit-and-run. Informed that the case is not being actively pursued by police, she vows revenge.

value.name: The Beast Must Die
value.description: Fans of schlocky horror movies will be disappointed (or relieved) to learn that The Beast Must Die is not a remake of the 70s movie with the 'werewolf minute' in which viewers were given 60 seconds to guess the human identity of a murderous lycanthrope.

value.name: Emilia Fox turns her hand to true crime in her new series
value.description: Emilia Fox, 46, has played a forensic pathologist in Silent Witness for 17 years. In new Channel 4 series In The Footsteps Of Killers, she examines real life unsolved murders from across the UK.

value.name: The Beast Must Die review: Britbox’s revenge thriller is unexpectedly gripping with a great cast
value.description: A troubled cop, traumatised after witnessing a colleague’s death. A mother bent on seeking revenge after her son was killed. A beautiful coastal location, boasting views begging you to stare at them through narrowed eyes.

value.name: Amazon Prime Video: 25 best TV shows to watch this weekend
value.description: Among Amazon Prime Video's catalogue of older favorites and B-movies you haven't heard of is a growing stack of impressive original shows. Recently the streamer tapped Barry Jenkins, the sublime filmmaker behind Moonlight,
